name: LearnNext Client
description: LearnNext is a smart education product from Next Education Pvt Ltd. It eases the learning process for school students. It helps them visualize complex topics, relate to abstract concepts, and crack tricky mathematical problems. In doing so, it encourages independent self-learning.   Features of LearnNext: 1. Its portable! It makes the learning process fun because the child is no more stuck to a desk while studying. So, his homework is more a mere chore to get done with. 2. Its smart! The LearnNext explains concepts in a concise way with relevant examples and exercises. 3. Its clear! The screen is comfortable for any student to study on it without any hassles. 4. Its relaxed! Student can learn at his or her own pace without any peer pressure. In a classroom, the one-to-many approach does not allow the space for the child to on own terms.   All boards available: All boards (including ICSE, CBSC, and SSC) and classes (from VI to X). They are available on subscription. You can also subscribe for multiple boards depending on your requirement.   Use a five day trial period! Once you register with us you will activate the required board and class for a period of five days before you buy it.   Buying options: 1. Download it online. 2. Buy a DVD.  We recommend a Wi-Fi connection to download the educational content as it is larger in size. To subscribe to LearnNext, call us at 1800-419-1234 (Toll Free) For support, call us at +91-40-66979999 (or) reach us at support@learnnext.com
